amateur.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who does an activity just for pleasure, not as their job
amateur.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Mickelson won his first major golf tournament while still an amateur.
amateur.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who you think is not very skilled at something
amateur.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: You English are a bunch of amateurs when it comes to romance.
amateur.translation[1].definitions[0].de: doing something for pleasure, or done for pleasure, and not as a job
amateur.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: amateur dramatics British English (=producing or acting in plays for pleasure)
amateur.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: It was a very amateur performance.
amateur.translation[2].definitions[0].de: someone who does an activity for pleasure, not as a job
amateur.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: He thinks the drawings could be the work of an amateur.
